item.title: Is Code Coverage Irrelevant?
item.author: Author
item.description: After reading the article “Is Code Coverage Irrelevant?” by Ron Jeffries I feel the necessity to accept the challenge and tell what I really think about code coverage. I’ve being thinking for some time about writting this article… So this is the best moment, I think. What does the coverage means? Let’s start with this twit: Two projects, one has 95% code coverage with tests, one has 45%.
